column2: an A.M. Eatery////We got in around 1:30 (eating at an A.M. Eatery in the afternoon
column3: reveling in the rebel) so the service was a bit slow and unattentive
column4: but that was also perhaps we requested to switch seats and therefore had to rezone into another waiter's section. Whatever the miscommunication
column5: it wasn't that bad of a mishap. When she finally showed up she was really pleasant and quick in taking our orders.
